name: the elder scrolls v skyrim
description: Winner of more than 200 Game of the Year Awards, Skyrim Special Edition brings the epic fantasy to life in stunning detail. The Special Edition includes the critically acclaimed game and add-ons with all-new features like remastered art and effects, volumetric god rays, dynamic depth of field, screen-space reflections, and more. Skyrim Special Edition also brings the full power of mods to the PC and consoles. New quests, environments, characters, dialogue, armor, weapons and more – with Mods, there are no limits to what you can experience.

name: fallout 4
description: Bethesda Game Studios, the award-winning creators of Fallout 3 and The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, welcome you to the world of Fallout 4 – their most ambitious game ever, and the next generation of open-world gaming.

name: spore
description: Be the architect of your own universe with Spore, an exciting single-player adventure. From Single Cell to Galactic God, evolve your creature in a universe of your own creations.

name: fallout new vegas
description:
Welcome to Vegas. New Vegas.
It’s the kind of town where you dig your own grave prior to being shot in the head and left for dead…and that’s before things really get ugly. It’s a town of dreamers and desperados being torn apart by warring factions vying for complete control of this desert oasis. It’s a place where the right kind of person with the right kind of weaponry can really make a name for themselves, and make more than an enemy or two along the way.
As you battle your way across the heat-blasted Mojave Wasteland, the colossal Hoover Dam, and the neon drenched Vegas Strip, you’ll be introduced to a colorful cast of characters, power-hungry factions, special weapons, mutated creatures and much more. Choose sides in the upcoming war or declare “winner takes all” and crown yourself the King of New Vegas in this follow-up to the 2008 videogame of the year, Fallout 3.

name: left 4 dead 2
description:
Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2), the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning Left 4 Dead, welcomes you into a zombie-infested world.
Blast cities, swamps and cemeteries to zombies with your friends in L4D2's five new scenarios, from Savannah to New Orleans!
Choose from four new survivors, fully equipped with classic and enhanced weapons. Along with firearms, wreak havoc with the infected using chainsaws, axes and of course the most dangerous melee weapon, the deadly frying pan.

name: path of exile
description: You are an Exile, struggling to survive on the dark continent of Wraeclast, as you fight to earn power that will allow you to exact your revenge against those who wronged you. Created by hardcore gamers, Path of Exile is an online Action RPG set in a dark fantasy world.

name: left 4 dead
description: From Valve (the creators of Counter-Strike, Half-Life and more) comes Left 4 Dead, a co-op action horror game for the PC and Xbox 360 that casts up to four players in an epic struggle for survival against swarming zombie hordes and terrifying mutant monsters.

name: team fortress 2
description: Nine distinct classes provide a broad range of tactical abilities and personalities. Constantly updated with new game modes, maps, equipment and, most importantly, hats!

name: tomb raider
description: Tomb Raider explores the intense origin story of Lara Croft and her ascent from a young woman to a hardened survivor.

name: the banner saga
description: Live through an epic role-playing Viking saga where your strategic choices directly affect your personal journey. Make allies as you travel with your caravan across this stunning yet harsh landscape. Carefully choose those who will help fight a new threat that jeopardizes an entire civilization.

name: dota 2
description:
Single battlefield. Infinite possibilities.
When it comes to the variety of heroes, abilities, and powerful items, Dota offers endless options. No match is ever the same. Each hero can play many roles, and every match has a variety of items to suit your hero and the situation. Dota does not impose limitations on how to play the game, it allows you to find your own playstyle.

name: ultra street fighter iv
description: The world’s greatest fighting game evolves to a whole new level with Ultra Street Fighter IV. Continuing the tradition of excellence the series is known for, five new characters and six new stages have been added for even more fighting mayhem, with rebalanced gameplay and original modes topping off this ultimate offering.

name: sid meiers civilization v
description: Become Ruler of the World by establishing and leading a civilization from the dawn of man into the space age: Wage war, conduct diplomacy, discover new technologies, go head-to-head with some of history’s greatest leaders and build the most powerful empire the world has ever known.

name: la noire
description:
Using the revolutionary animation technology Motion Scan that astonishingly captures every detail of the actor's gestures and facial movements, LA Noire offers a unique interactive experience as a violent crime/thriller game that combines breathtaking action with true detective action. Gather clues, seek and find suspects, interrogate witnesses, and the truth is revealed in this city where everyone is hiding something.
Using the revolutionary animation technology Motion Scan that astonishingly captures every detail of the actor's gestures and facial movements, LA Noire offers a unique interactive experience as a violent crime/thriller game that combines breathtaking action with true detective action. Gather clues, seek and find suspects, interrogate witnesses, and the truth is revealed in this city where everyone is hiding something.
Using the revolutionary animation technology Motion Scan that astonishingly captures every detail of the actor's gestures and facial movements, LA Noire offers a unique interactive experience as a violent crime/thriller game that combines breathtaking action with true detective action. Gather clues, seek and find suspects, interrogate witnesses, and the truth is revealed in this city where everyone is hiding something.

name: 7 days to die
description: 7 Days to Die; It is an open world game that is a unique combination of first-person shooter, survival-horror, tower defense and role-playing games. Play the ultimate zombie survival sandbox RPG, the first of its kind. Navezgane is waiting!

name: final fantasy vii
description:
In Midgar, a city controlled by the mega-conglomerate Shinra Inc., the No. 1 Mako Reactor has been blown up by a rebel group, AVALANCHE.

AVALANCHE was secretly formed to wage a rebellion against Shinra Inc., an organisation which is absorbing Mako energy, destroying the natural resources of the planet. Cloud, a former member of Shinra's elite combat force, SOLDIER, was involved with the bombing of the Mako Reactor.

name: orcs must die 2
description: You’ve tossed, burned and sliced them by the thousands – now orcs must die more than ever before! Grab a friend and slay orcs in untold numbers in this sequel to the 2011 AIAS Strategy Game of the Year from Robot Entertainment.

name: killing floor
description: 6-player co-op survival horror at its finest! Free updates, free special events and a ridiculous amount of fun!

name: bastion
description: Discover the secrets of the Calamity, a surreal catastrophe that shattered the world to pieces.

name: undertale
description: Welcome to UNDERTALE. In this RPG, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters. Now you must find your way out... or stay trapped forever.

name: counterstrike global offensive
description: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS: GO) takes the team-based action game it pioneered when it first launched 19 years ago to the next level. CS:GO offers new maps, characters, weapons and game modes, as well as updated versions of classic CS content (de_dust2 etc.).

name: grand theft auto v
description: The PC version of Grand Theft Auto V offers players the opportunity to explore the world of Los Santos and Blaine County in 4k and beyond resolution and 60fps refresh rate.

name: insurgency
description: Take to the streets for intense close quarters combat, where a team's survival depends upon securing crucial strongholds and destroying enemy supply in this multiplayer and cooperative Source Engine based experience.

name: metal gear solid v the phantom pain
description: Opening a new era in the cutting-edge METAL GEAR membership powered by the Fox Engine, METAL GEAR SOLID V: The Phantom Pain provides gamers with a superior gaming experience as they are given the tactical freedom to perform open world missions.

name: stalker shadow of chernobyl
description: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl tells a story about survival in the Zone – a very dangerous place, where you fear not only the radiation, anomalies and deadly creatures, but other S.T.A.L.K.E.R.s, who have their own goals and wishes.

name: saints row the third
description: Years after taking Stilwater for their own, the Third Street Saints have evolved from street gang to household brand name, with Saints sneakers, Saints energy drinks and Johnny Gat bobble head dolls all available at a store near you.

name: far cry 3
description: Discover the dark secrets of a lawless island ruled by violence and take the fight to the enemy as you try to escape. You’ll need more than luck to escape alive!

name: rocket league
description: Rocket League is a soccer game with cars developed and published by Psyonix. It was first released in July 2015 for Microsoft Windows and PlayStation 4 platforms. The version developed for Xbox One was released in 2016.

name: assassins creed ii
description: Assassin’s Creed® 2 is the follow-up to the title that became the fastest-selling new IP in video game history. The highly anticipated title features a new hero, Ezio Auditore da Firenze, a young Italian noble, and a new era, the Renaissance.

name: far cry 4
description: Hidden in the towering Himalayas lies Kyrat, a country steeped in tradition and violence. You are Ajay Ghale. Traveling to Kyrat to fulfill your mother’s dying wish, you find yourself caught up in a civil war to overthrow the oppressive regime of dictator Pagan Min.

name: space pirates and zombies
description: Explore a randomly generated Galaxy populated with factions, enemies, missions, and items providing you with a unique experience each time you play.

name: dying light
description: A first-person action survival game set in the post-apocalyptic era in an open world overrun by flesh-seeking zombies. Explore the city ravaged by a mysterious virus outbreak. Seek supplies, craft weapons and fight hordes of afflicted.

name: just cause 2
description: Dive into an adrenaline-fuelled free-roaming adventure with 400 square miles of rugged terrain and hundreds of weapons and vehicles.

name: mirrors edge
description: In a city where information is heavily monitored, couriers called Runners transport sensitive data. In this seemingly utopian paradise, a crime has been committed, & you are being hunted. You are a Runner called Faith and this innovative first-person action-adventure is your story.

name: mad max
description:
Become Mad Max, the lone warrior in a cruel post-apocalyptic world where cars are meant to survive.
In this exciting, free world, third-person perspective, you must fight relentlessly and drive your vehicle against a brutal gang of thugs to survive in the Wasteland.

name: portal 2
description: The "Perpetual Testing Initiative" has been expanded to allow you to design co-op puzzles for you and your friends!

name: deus ex human revolution
description: You play Adam Jensen, an ex-SWAT specialist who's been handpicked to oversee the defensive needs of one of America's most experimental biotechnology firms. Your job is to safeguard company secrets, but when a black ops team breaks in and kills the very scientists you were hired to protect, everything you thought you knew about your job changes.

name: middleearth shadow of mordor
description: Fight through Mordor and uncover the truth of the spirit that compels you, discover the origins of the Rings of Power, build your legend and ultimately confront the evil of Sauron in this new chronicle of Middle-earth.

name: tropico 4
description: The world is changing and Tropico is moving with the times - geographical powers rise and fall and the world market is dominated by new players with new demands and offers - and you, as El Presidente, face a whole new set of challenges.

name: dust an elysian tail
description: Immerse yourself in a gorgeous hand-painted world on a search for your true identity. As the mysterious warrior, Dust, your action-packed journey will take you from peaceful glades to snowy mountaintops and beyond.

name: south park the stick of truth
description: From the perilous battlefields of the fourth-grade playground, a young hero will rise, destined to be South Park’s savior. From the creators of South Park, Trey Parker and Matt Stone, comes an epic quest to become… cool. Introducing South Park™: The Stick of Truth™.

name: sleeping dogs
description: As Wei Shen, an undercover cop trying to take down the Triads, you'll have to fight your way up the organization without blowing your cover.

name: watchdogs
description: In today's hyper-connected world, Chicago operates under ctOS, the most advanced computer network in America.

name: saints row iv
description: The US President must save the Earth from alien overlord Zinyak using an arsenal of superpowers and strange weapons in the wildest open world game ever.

name: dayz
description: How long can you survive in a post-apocalyptic world? Infected "zombies" abound in this region, where you'll fight other survivors for limited resources. Will you join hands with strangers? Or will you say you can't trust the hand and play the wolf alone? Write your story on DayZ

name: halflife 2
description: The year is 1998. Half-Life shocks the gaming industry by combining gripping fictional story and stunning action. Valve's debut game, which has won more than 50 Game of the Year awards and named "The Best PC Game of All Time" by PC Gamer, has sold over eight million copies worldwide. And now.

name: dirt 3
description: Dirt 3 is a simcade racing video game developed and published by Codemasters for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360. It was the first game in the series to not have the Colin McRae alias.

name: ftl faster than light
description: This "spaceship simulation roguelike-like" allows you to take your ship and crew on an adventure through a randomly generated galaxy filled with glory and bitter defeat.

name: age of empires ii hd edition
description: Age of Empires II has been re-imagined in high definition with new features, trading cards, improved AI, workshop support, multiplayer, Steamworks integration and more!

name: batman arkham asylum goty edition
description: Experience what it’s like to be Batman and face off against Gotham's greatest villians. Explore every inch of Arkham Asylum and roam freely on the infamous island.

name: gunpoint
description: Gunpoint is a stealth puzzle game that lets you rewire its levels to trick people. You play a freelance spy who takes jobs from his clients to break into high security buildings and steal sensitive data.

name: metro 2033
description: In 2013 the world was devastated by an apocalyptic event, annihilating almost all mankind and turning the Earth's surface into a poisonous wasteland. A handful of survivors took refuge in the depths of the Moscow underground, and human civilization entered a new Dark Age. The year is 2033.

name: assassins creed iii
description: Relive the American Revolution or experience it for the first time in Assassin's Creed® III Remastered with enhanced graphics and enhanced gameplay mechanics. Also included is Assassin's Creed Liberation Remastered and all solo DLC content.

name: ori and the blind forest
description: “Ori and the Blind Forest” tells the tale of a young orphan destined for heroics, through a visually stunning action-platformer crafted by Moon Studios for PC.

name: far cry 3 blood dragon
description: Welcome to the 80s-looking future. It's 2007 and you're up against a rebellious cyborg army. You are Sargent Rex Colt, a Mark IV Cyber ??Commando fighting at war. Your mission: to capture the girl, kill the bad guys and save the world.

name: burnout paradise the ultimate box
description: Burnout Paradise: The Ultimate Box is a re-release of Burnout Paradise with all of its free updates and Game Changing Content Packs at the time of release; Astaire, Bogart, Cagney, Burnout Bikes, PlayStation 3 Trophies (PlayStation 3 release), the Party Pack, and the Free February Update. It is the first Burnout game to be released on the PC.

name: prototype 2
description: The sequel to Radical Entertainment’s best-selling open-world action game of 2009, Prototype® 2 takes the unsurpassed carnage of the original Prototype and continues the experience of becoming the ultimate shape-shifting weapon. You are Sgt James Heller, husband to a deceased wife and child and a soldier left simply to die.

name: game dev tycoon
description: In Game Dev Tycoon, you can relive the history of the gaming industry by starting your own video games company in the 80s. Create bestselling games. Research new technologies and invent new game genres. Become the leader of the market and have fans from all over the world.

name: sniper elite 3
description: Sniper Elite 3 is a tactical third-person shooter that combines stealth, gameplay choice and genre-defining ballistics with huge, open levels and the exotic terrain of World War 2 North Africa.

name: rogue legacy
description: Rogue Legacy is a genealogical rogue-"LITE" where anyone can be a hero. Each time you die, your child will succeed you. Every child is unique. One child might be colorblind, another might be a dward with have vertigo. But that's OK, because no one is perfect, and you don't have to be to succeed.

name: plague inc evolved
description: Plague Inc: Evolved is a unique strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation game. Your pathogen has infected "Patient Zero". You can now bring about the end of human history by developing this deadly, universal epidemic by adapting to whatever precautions people take.

name: halflife 2 episode two
description: Half-Life® 2: Episode Two is the second installment in Valve's new trilogy of award-winning and best-selling Half-Life® adventures. Dr. As Gordon Freeman, you were last seen exiting City 17 with Alyx Vance when the Citadel building exploded in a storm of unknown reasons.

name: spec ops the line
description: A Third-Person modern military Shooter designed to challenge players' morality by putting them in the middle of unspeakable situations.

name: dishonored
description: Dishonored is an immersive first-person action game that casts you as a supernatural assassin driven by revenge. With Dishonored’s flexible combat system, creatively eliminate your targets as you combine the supernatural abilities, weapons and unusual gadgets at your disposal.

name: halflife 2 episode one
description: Half-Life 2 has sold 4 million copies worldwide and won over 35 Game of the Year Awards. Episode One is the first game in the series to reveal the dire consequences of the journey beyond Half-Life 2 and City 17. It also includes two multiplayer games. It doesn't need Half-Life 2.

name: wolfenstein the new order
description: Wolfenstein®: The New Order reignites the series that created the first-person shooter genre. Wolfenstein offers a deep game narrative packed with action, adventure and first-person combat.

name: metro last light
description: It is the year 2034. Beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the tunnels of the Metro, the remnants of mankind are besieged by deadly threats from outside – and within. Mutants stalk the catacombs beneath the desolate surface, and hunt amidst the poisoned skies above.

name: dead space
description: You are Isaac Clarke, an engineer on the spacecraft USG Ishimura. You're not a warrior. You're not a soldier. You are, however, the last line of defense for the remaining living crew.

name: hotline miami
description: Hotline Miami is a high-octane action game overflowing with raw brutality, hard-boiled gunplay and skull crushing close combat.

name: portal
description: Portal™ is Valve's new single player game. The game is set in the mysterious Aperture Science Labs, Portal is known as one of the most innovative games in the universe and promises players unmatched gameplay with hours of gameplay.

name: fear 2 project origin
description: Assume the role of Special Forces Sgt. Becket as your routine mission quickly turns into a fight for survival against the wrath of Alma Wade. As Alma's terrifying power surges out of control, your squad is forced to battle through an apocalyptic landscape in search of clues for how to destroy her!

name: the binding of isaac
description: When Isaac's mother began to hear the voice of God demanding sacrifices to prove her faith in him, Isaac fled to the basement where he faced ravenous enemies, lost siblings, fears, and eventually his mother.

name: metal gear rising revengeance
description: Developed by Kojima Productions and PlatinumGames, METAL GEAR RISING: REVENGEANCE takes the renowned METAL GEAR franchise into exciting new territory with an all-new action experience.

name: call of duty modern warfare 2
description: The sequel to the most anticipated game of the year and the best-selling first-person action game of all time; Modern Warfare 2 continues the gripping and exciting action as players face new threats committed to bringing the world to the brink of destruction.

name: counterstrike source
description: Counter-Strike: Source blends Counter-Strike's award-winning teamplay action with the advanced technology of Source™ technology.

name: dungeon defenders
description: Create a hero from one of four classes to save Etheria in this 4-player coop Tower Defense Action-RPG. Includes Steam exclusive Portal gun & TF2 familiars!

name: call of duty black ops
description: The greatest First-Person Shooter action franchise of all time returns with Call of Duty®: Black Ops, following last year's record-breaking game Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare 2.

name: empire total war
description:
Complete your Total War collection with this Definitive Edition of Total War: EMPIRE, which includes all DLC and feature updates since the game’s release:
Take on the Warpath Campaign and lead one of 5 new Native American factions in an epic war to defend your lands and drive out the invaders.

name: ark survival evolved
description: As a man or woman who is freezing and starving naked on the shores of a mysterious island called ARK, you must hunt, craft supplies, grow food crops, and build shelters to survive.

name: unturned
description: You are one of the survivors of an ancient civilization overrun by zombies, and you must act and form alliances with your friends to stay in the realm of the living.

name: rust
description: The only aim in Rust is to survive. Everything wants you to die - the island’s wildlife and other inhabitants, the environment, other survivors. Do whatever it takes to last another night.

name: dead island riptide
description: Welcome to the zombie apocalypse experience of a lifetime – more beautiful than ever. Caught in an epic zombie outbreak on the tropical island of Banoi, your only thought is: Survive!

name: garrys mod
description: Garry's Mod is a physics sandbox. There aren't any predefined aims or goals. We give you the tools and leave you to play.

name: counterstrike nexon zombies
description: Counter-Strike Nexon: Zombies is a free-to-play MMOFPS game featuring action-packed PvP and PvE competition with new modes, maps, weapons and Zombies, along with content from the original Counter-Strike!

name: outlast
description: Hell is an experiment you can't survive in Outlast, a first-person survival horror game developed by veterans of some of the biggest game franchises in history. As investigative journalist Miles Upshur, explore Mount Massive Asylum and try to survive long enough to discover its terrible secret... if you dare.

name: robocraft
description: Build insane, fully customisable robot battle vehicles that drive, hover, walk and fly in the free-to-play action game Robocraft. Add weapons from the future and jump in the driving seat as you take your creation into battle against other players online!

name: mafia ii
description: Vito Scaletta has started to make a name for himself on the streets of Empire Bay as someone who can be trusted to get a job done. Together with his buddy Joe, he is working to prove himself to the Mafia, quickly escalating up the family ladder with crimes of larger reward, status and consequence… the life as a wise guy isn’t quite as untouchable as it seems.

name: americas army proving grounds
description: https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/203290/header.jpg?t=1604338987

name: apb reloaded
description: The world’s first and premier Action MMO Third Person Shooter allows you to choose between two sides of the law. Play as Enforcer or Criminal, customize your gear for the task at hand and hit the streets and play how you want in a city filled with more action this side of a Hollywood blockbuster.

name: orion prelude
description: Work together to survive the devastating Dinosaur horde in huge, endless environments.

name: counterstrike condition zero
description: Featuring the award-winning multiplayer of Counter-Strike, updated with new content such as the expanded "Tour of Duty" operation and numerous combat modes, and Counter-Strike: Condition Zero, featuring 12 brand new single-player missions, brings you incredible singleplayer and multiplayer content.

name: counterstrike
description: Play the world's #1 online action game. Fight against incredibly realistic different types of terrorists in this wild popular team game. Forge alliances with your teammates to complete strategic missions. Destroy enemy territories. Rescue the hostages. Your role will influence your teammate's success.

name: mount  blade warband
description: In a land torn by endless wars, it's time to assemble your army of veteran soldiers and engage in battle. Lead your men into battle, expand your territory and challenge your enemies for the Throne of Calradia!

name: castle crashers
description: Hack, slash, and smash your way to victory in this award winning 2D arcade adventure from The Behemoth!

name: payday 2
description: PAYDAY 2 is an action-packed, four-player co-op shooter that once again lets gamers don the masks of the original PAYDAY crew - Dallas, Hoxton, Wolf and Chains - as they descend on Washington DC for an epic crime spree.

name: adventure capitalist
description: Welcome, eager young investor, to AdVenture Capitalist! Arguably the world's greatest Capitalism simulator!

name: project cars
description: Discover this world of speed with stunning graphics and feel the asphalt in your bones while experiencing a unique driving experience. Create your own racing driver by choosing the dynamic career mode and choose from many different racing options, or if you wish, give your opponents dust in online multiplayer games.

name: defense grid the awakening
description: Defense Grid: The Awakening is a unique spin on tower defense gameplay that will appeal to players of all skill levels. A horde of enemies is invading, and it's up to the player to stop them by strategically building fortification towers around their base.

name: the stanley parable
description: The Stanley Parable is a first person exploration game. You will play as Stanley, and you will not play as Stanley. You will follow a story, you will not follow a story. You will have a choice, you will have no choice. The game will end, the game will never end.

name: torchlight ii
description: The adventure continues in Torchlight II! An Action RPG full of epic battles, lots of treasure and a completely random world. Bring your friends on your journey with online and LAN multiplayer modes.

name: amnesia the dark descent
description: Amnesia: The Dark Descent, a first person survival horror. A game about immersion, discovery and living through a nightmare. An experience that will chill you to the core.

name: braid
description: Braid is a puzzle-platformer, drawn in a painterly style, where you can manipulate the flow of time in strange and unusual ways. From a house in the city, journey to a series of worlds and solve puzzles to rescue an abducted princess.

name: fallout 3  game of the year edition
description: Prepare for the Future™ With Fallout 3: Game of the Year Edition, experience the most acclaimed game of 2008 like never before. Create a character of your choosing and descend into an awe-inspiring, post-apocalyptic world where every minute is a fight for survival.

name: terraria
description: Dig, fight, explore, build! Nothing is impossible in this exciting adventure game. Also available in the Quad Pack!

name: assassins creed brotherhood
description: Live and breathe as Ezio, a legendary Master Assassin, in his enduring struggle against the powerful Templar Order. He must journey into Italy’s greatest city, Rome, center of power, greed and corruption to strike at the heart of the enemy.

name: saints row 2
description: Saints Row 2 brings true freedom to open-world gaming. Players can play as who they want, how they want, and with whomever they want in this sequel to the much acclaimed and tremendously successful Saints Row

name: grand theft auto episodes from liberty city
description: Grand Theft Auto: Episodes from Liberty City includes both The Lost and Damned and The Ballad of Gay Tony together and does not require a copy of the original Grand Theft Auto IV to play.

name: the witcher enhanced edition
description: Become The Witcher, Geralt of Rivia, a legendary monster slayer caught in a web of intrigue woven by forces vying for control of the world. Make difficult decisions and live with the consequences in a game that will immerse you in an extraordinary tale like no other.

name: batman arkham origins
description: As of December 4, 2016, the online services portion of Batman: Arkham Origins will be retired. We thank those that have joined us to battle over the last 3 years. The Single player campaign may still be played and enjoyed offline.

name: the witcher 2 assassins of kings enhanced edition
description: A time of untold chaos has come. Mighty forces clash behind the scenes in a struggle for power and influence. The Northern Kingdoms mobilize for war. But armies on the march are not enough to stop a bloody conspiracy...

name: the elder scrolls iii morrowind
description: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind® Game of the Year Edition includes Morrowind plus all of the content from the Bloodmoon and Tribunal expansions. The original Mod Construction Set is not included in this package.

name: worms reloaded
description: Ten years on from Worms™ Armageddon and the turn-based comic mayhem continues in Worms™ Reloaded, an all-new edition available for PC through Steam.

name: simcity 4 deluxe
description: SimCity 4 Deluxe Edition includes the bestselling SimCity 4 and the all-new SimCity 4 Rush Hour Expansion Pack. Create the most massive region of cities ever, with a farming town, bedroom community, high-tech commercial center, and industrial backbone.

name: chivalry medieval warfare
description: Besiege castles and raid villages in Chivalry: Medieval Warfare, a fast-paced medieval first person slasher with a focus on multiplayer battles

name: alan wake
description: A Dark Presence stalks the small town of Bright Falls, pushing Alan Wake to the brink of sanity in his fight to unravel the mystery and save his love.

name: bioshock
description: BioShock is a shooter unlike any you've ever played, loaded with weapons and tactics never seen. You'll have a complete arsenal at your disposal from simple revolvers to grenade launchers and chemical throwers, but you'll also be forced to genetically modify your DNA to create an even more deadly weapon: you. Injectable plasmids give you super human powers: blast electrical currents into water to electrocute multiple enemies, or freeze them solid and obliterate them with the swing of a wrench.

name: fez
description: Gomez is a 2D creature living in a 2D world. Or is he? When the existence of a mysterious 3rd dimension is revealed to him, Gomez is sent out on a journey that will take him to the very end of time and space. Use your ability to navigate 3D structures from 4 distinct classic 2D perspectives.

name: kingdoms of amalur reckoning
description: The minds of New York Times bestselling author R.A. Salvatore, Spawn creator Todd McFarlane, and Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion lead designer Ken Rolston have combined to create Kingdoms of Amalur: Reckoning, a new role-playing game set in a world worth saving.

name: prison architect
description: Only the world's fiercest Prison Warden can deal with the world's most vicious inmates. Design and customize a prison in Prison Architect.

name: scribblenauts unlimited
description: The best-selling, award-winning franchise is back – on your home PC in gorgeous HD for the first time.

name: banished
description: In this city-building strategy game, you control a group of exiled travelers who decide to restart their lives in a new land. They have only the clothes on their backs and a cart filled with supplies from their homeland. The townspeople of Banished are your primary resource.

name: antichamber
description: Antichamber is a mind-bending psychological exploration game where nothing can be taken for granted. Discover an Escher-like world where hallways wrap around upon each other, spaces reconfigure themselves, and accomplishing the impossible may just be the only way forward.

name: goat simulator
description: Goat Simulator is the latest in high-tech Goat Simulation technology.

name: psychonauts
description: A Psychic Odyssey Through the Minds of Misfits, Monsters, and Madmen. This classic action/adventure platformer from acclaimed developers Double Fine Productions follows the story of a young psychic named Razputin.

name: papers please
description: Congratulations. The October labor lottery is complete. Your name was pulled. For immediate placement, report to the Ministry of Admission at Grestin Border Checkpoint. An apartment will be provided for you and your family in East Grestin. Expect a Class-8 dwelling.

name: surgeon simulator
description: Surgeon Simulator is an amazing surgery simulator that combines dark humor with life-saving surgical operations. Without even ordinary equipment, wannabe surgeon Dr. As Bukke, operate on patients including Donald Trump! ...is that hammer over there?

name: cities skylines
description: Cities: Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation. The game introduces new game play elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience

name: plants vs zombies game of the year
description: Zombies are invading your home, and the only defense is your arsenal of plants! Armed with an alien nursery-worth of zombie-zapping plants like peashooters and cherry bombs, you'll need to think fast and plant faster to stop dozens of types of zombies dead in their tracks.

name: alien swarm
description: Co-operative multiplayer game and complete code base available for free.

name: resident evil 5  biohazard 5
description: This game is a port of the Games for Windows - Live version that was released in 2009. If you buy the Untold Stories Bundle here on Steam, it will be the same as upgrading to Resident Evil 5 Gold Edition.

name: the wolf among us
description: From the makers of the 2012 Game of the Year: The Walking Dead, comes a thriller based on the award-winning Fables comic books. As Bigby Wolf you will discover that a brutal, bloody murder is just a taste of things to come in a game series where your every decision can have enormous consequences.

name: state of decay
description: The end is here. Life as you knew it has gone to hell after the mother of all zombie outbreaks. Now you and the few scattered survivors must band together to survive and rebuild in a 3rd-person action game set in a dynamic open world.

name: contagion
description: Contagion is not just a Zombie game, but instead with a more realistic and different approach. Unique characters, different maps, weapons, items have an atmosphere that makes your every playthrough different. It provides a unique experience with goals and new ways that are constantly changing.

name: the simstm 3
description: The Sims 3: Create the perfect world with full customization at your fingertips. Refine personalities and help fulfill destinies.

name: borderlands 2
description: The Ultimate Vault Hunter’s Upgrade lets you get the most out of the Borderlands 2 experience.

name: payday the heist
description: Take on the role of a hardened career criminal executing intense, dynamic heists in constant pursuit of the next “big score”

name: battlefield bad company 2
description: Battlefield: Bad Company 2™ brings the award-winning Battlefield gameplay to the forefront of PC gaming with best-in-class vehicular combat and unexpected "Battlefield moments." New vehicles like the ATV and a transport helicopter allow for all-new multiplayer tactics on the Battlefield.

name: smite
description: Join over 35 million players in SMITE, Battleground of the Gods! Swing Thor's hammer, turn your enemies to stone like Medusa, or choose from over 100 mythological icons. Become a God and play for FREE today!

name: warframe
description: Wake up as an unstoppable warrior and fight alongside your friends in this story-driven, free-to-play online action game.

name: metal gear solid v ground zeroes
description: World-renowned Kojima Productions brings the Metal Gear Solid franchise to Steam with METAL GEAR SOLID V: GROUND ZEROES. Play as the legendary hero Snake and infiltrate a Cuban military base to rescue the hostages. Can you make it out alive?

name: no more room in hell
description: The chances of you surviving this all out war of society and the undead are slim to none. Already, there are millions of the walking dead shambling about, searching for food to eat. There's no known cure. One bite can possibly end it all for you. However, you aren't alone in this nightmare.

name: arma 2
description: Building on 10 years of constant engine development, ARMA II boasts the most realistic combat environment in the world. It models real world ballistics & round deflection, materials penetration, features a realtime day/night cycle and dynamic wind, weather and environmental effects.

name: heroes  generals
description: Shoot, blow things up, fly or rain down orders in the ultimate Free-to-Play, large-scale, multiplayer, shooter experience. Thousands of players fight for a massive war of nations in loads of battles. The first to capture 15 cities captures the victory.

name: euro truck simulator 2
description: Deliver your important cargo to unbelievable distances in your truck, become the king of the road as you travel across Europe! There are dozens of cities to explore in England, Belgium, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Poland and many other countries. Your endurance, skill and speed will be pushed to the limit. Get behind the wheel and prove you have what it takes to be part of an elite truck crew!

name: war thunder
description: Used by War Thunder, WWII and Korean War vehicles. Crucial air, ground and sea battles are fought with players from all over the world in an environment under development.

name: arma 3
description: Experience the real war game in a huge sandbox. Arma 3; It is the premier military game designed for PC with a wide variety of single and multiplayer content, at least 20 vehicles, at least 40 weapons and unlimited opportunities to create content. Original, diverse, open. To the front with Arma 3!

name: arma 2 operation arrowhead
description: Three years after the conflict in Chernarus, portrayed in the original Arma 2, a new flashpoint explodes in the Green Sea Region. Coalition forces led by the US Army are deployed to Takistan to quickly restore peace and prevent further civilian casualties.

name: this war of mine
description: In This War of Mine, you play not as an elite soldier, but as a group of civilians trying to escape from a besieged city that lacks food and medicine and is constantly in danger of snipers and attacking scavengers. The game offers a combat experience seen from a completely new angle.

name: total war rome ii  emperor edition
description: About Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition Emperor Edition is the most comprehensive edition of ROME II, featuring a more advanced policy system, revamped building chains, more balanced battles, and better visuals both in the scenario and battles.

name: xcom enemy unknown
description: XCOM: Enemy Unknown will place you in control of a secret paramilitary organization called XCOM. As the XCOM commander, you will defend against a terrifying global alien invasion by managing resources, advancing technologies, and overseeing combat strategies and individual unit tactics.

name: wakfu
description: STEP INTO A LIMITLESS UNIVERSE Touchdown in the World of Twelve and set off on a great adventure in WAKFU - an original massively multiplayer online role playing universe where humor goes hand in hand with action-packed, tactical battles.

name: starbound
description: In Starbound, you create your own story - there’s no wrong way to play! You may choose to save the universe from the forces that destroyed your home, uncovering greater galactic mysteries in the process, or you may wish to forego a heroic journey entirely in favor of colonizing uncharted planets.

name: mass effect 2
description: Recruit. Explore. Control.Two years after Commander Shepard repelled invading Reapers bent on the destruction of organic life, a mysterious new enemy has emerged. On the fringes of known space, something is silently abducting entire human colonies.

name: mass effect
description: Mass Effect™ Legendary Edition includes single-player base content and over 40 DLCs from the hit Mass Effect, Mass Effect 2, and Mass Effect 3 games; It will include promotional weapons, armors and packs, which will be remastered and optimized for 4K Ultra HD.

name: clicker heroes
description: Have you ever wondered what a quadrillion damage per second looks like? You don't have to worry anymore! Start your quest to figure it out today!

name: planetside 2
description: PlanetSide 2 is an all-out planetary war, where thousands of players battle as one across enormous continents. Utilize infantry, ground and air vehicles, and teamwork to destroy your enemies in this revolutionary first-person shooter on a massive scale.

name: batman arkham city
description: Get Batman: Arkham City and all DLC for one low price with the release of the GOTY Edition!

name: eve online
description: EVE Online is a free-to-play community driven space MMO where players can choose their own path from countless different options. Experience space exploration, immense PvP and PvE battles, mining, industry and a thriving player economy in an ever-expanding sandbox

name: bioshock infinite
description: Indebted to the wrong people, with his life on the line, veteran of the U.S. Cavalry and now hired gun, Booker DeWitt has only one opportunity to wipe his slate clean. He must rescue Elizabeth, a mysterious girl imprisoned since childhood and locked up in the flying city of Columbia.

name: dc universe online
description: DC Universe Online is a Free-to-Play, massive multiplayer online action game set in the popular DC Universe. Become one of a new breed of Heroes or Villains and wield incredible powers as you go to war with legendary characters such as Batman, Superman, Lex Luthor and The Joker.

name: rift
description: RIFT is a massively multiplayer online adventure (MMORPG) set in the dynamic fantasy universe of Telara. You are an Ascended, a hero of Telara, protecting your land against invaders from the elemental Planes. Telara is a realm where battles can begin anywhere at any time. Stay on your guard and fight for glory!

name: anno 2070
description: Build your society of the future, colonize islands, and create sprawling megacities with multitudes of buildings, vehicles, and resources to manage.

name: rage
description: Powered by id’s revolutionary id Tech® 5 technology, RAGE is an intense first-person shooter with breakneck vehicle combat, an expansive world to explore, and jaw-dropping graphics!

name: borderlands
description:
Get ready for the mind blowing insanity! Play as one of four trigger-happy mercenaries and take out everything that stands in your way!
With its addictive action, frantic first-person shooter combat, massive arsenal of weaponry, RPG elements and four-player co-op*, Borderlands is a breakthrough experience that challenges all the conventions of modern shooters.

name: limbo
description: Worried about his sister's fate, a boy enters LIMBO

name: archeblade
description: ArcheBlade is a free to play 3D multiplayer fighting game that captures the essence of combo-based fighting games combined with unique game modes. Play as one of many characters and master your skills to become the best fighter.

name: day of defeat
description: Join one of the Axis and Allied troops in the World War II theater and take a part in this theater. Players can choose any of the light/attack/heavy units equipped with historical weapons, sniper or machine gunner class and take part in this theater arena.

name: warhammer 40000 dawn of war ii
description: We are in the 41st Millennium in the Aurelia Subsector, a cluster of worlds at the edge of the galaxy, and an epic scale war is about to begin.

name: duke nukem forever
description: The King arrives with an arsenal of over-the-top weapons, giant explosions and pure unadulterated fun!

name: sniper ghost warrior
description: As a Ghost Warrior, an elite sniper in a highly trained special ops unit, your unique skills in the art of stalking, target detection, surveillance and shooting accuracy will determine mission success.

name: company of heroes 2
description: Experience the ultimate WWII RTS platform with COH2 and its standalone expansions. This package includes the base game, which you can then upgrade by purchasing The Western Front Armies, Ardennes Assault and/or The British Forces. More info in the "About This Game" section below.

name: sins of a solar empire rebellion
description: Command a space-faring empire in Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion, the new stand-alone expansion that combines 4X depth with real-time strategy gameplay.

name: wargame red dragon
description: The new reference in RTS at its best! The Wargame series returns to duty, larger, richer and more spectacular than ever before. In Wargame Red Dragon, you are engaged in a large-scale conflict where Western forces clash against the Communist bloc.

name: wargame european escalation
description: The New Fatal Error DLC includes a new 5-mission Operation and touch-screen controls.

name: age of empires iii complete collection
description: Microsoft Studios brings you three epic Age of Empires III games in one monumental collection for the first time.

name: command and conquer red alert 3
description: The desperate leadership of a doomed Soviet Union travels back in time to change history and restore the glory of Mother Russia.

name: defiance
description: Join the futuristic online open-world shooter where thousands of players scour a transformed Earth competing for alien technology.

name: democracy 3
description: Have you ever wanted to be president? or prime-minister? Convinced you could do a better job of running the country? Let's face it, you could hardly do a worse job than our current political leaders.

name: tropico 5
description: Return to the remote island nation of Tropico and expand your Dynasty’s reign from the early colonial period to beyond the 21st Century, facing new challenges including advanced trading mechanics, technology and scientific research, as well as cooperative and competitive MULTIPLAYER.

name: hitman absolution
description: The original assassin is back! Betrayed by the Agency and hunted by the police, Agent 47 finds himself pursuing redemption in a corrupt and twisted world.

name: killing floor 2
description: 6-player co-op Zed-slaughtering mayhem. And now, 12-player Versus Survival mode, too - now you can BE the Zeds!

name: dino dday
description: Frantic, multiplayer action involving Nazis and dinosaurs! What are you waiting for? This is World War II as it should have been!

name: warhammer 40000 space marine
description: In Warhammer 40,000 Space Marine, you play Captain Titus, a Space Marine, a member of the Ultramarines squad, who has experienced countless battles.

name: neverwinter
description: Neverwinter is a free-to-play action MMORPG based on the famous fantasy role-playing game Dungeons & Dragons. Epic stories, action-packed combat and classic role-playing await any hero brave enough to enter the fantasy world of Neverwinter!

name: reus
description: In Reus, you control powerful giants to shape the planet to your will. You can create mountains, oceans, forests and more. Enrich your planet with plants, minerals and animal life. There is only one thing on the planet that you do not control: mankind, with all their virtues and and all their vices.

name: need for speed hot pursuit
description: Need for Speed Hot Pursuit launches you into a new open-world landscape behind the wheel of the world's fastest and most beautiful cars. From Criterion, the award-winning studio behind the Burnout series, Hot Pursuit will redefine racing games for a whole new generation.

name: dark souls ii scholar of the first sin
description: DARK SOULS™ II: Scholar of the First Sin takes the series' notorious obscurity and gameplay to a whole new level. Join this dark adventure and withstand tough enemy encounters, diabolical dangers and brutal challenges.

name: the forest
description: As the lone survivor of a passenger jet crash, you find yourself in a mysterious forest battling to stay alive against a society of cannibalistic mutants. Build, explore, survive in this terrifying first person survival horror simulator.

name: realm of the mad god
description: Team up with dozens of players and battle through the Realm of the Mad God, Oryx. With a retro 8-bit style, Realm is an evolution of traditional MMO gameplay.

name: halflife 2 deathmatch
description: Fast-paced multiplayer action set in the Half-Life 2 universe! HL2's physics brings a new dimension to deathmatch games. Play a normal deathmatch or try the Combine vs. Resistance teamfight mode. Throw a toilet bowl at your friend today!

name: day of defeat source
description: Valve's WWII Multiplayer Classic - Now available for Mac.

name: lego marvel super heroes
description: LEGO® Marvel™ Super Heroes features an original story crossing the entire Marvel Universe. Players take control of Iron Man, Spider-Man, the Hulk, Captain America, Wolverine and many more Marvel characters as they unite to stop Loki and a host of other Marvel villains from assembling a super-weapon capable of destroying the world.

name: warhammer 40000 dawn of war ii  chaos rising
description: In Dawn of War II: Chaos Rising, you will command the Blood Ravens and defend the sector against the Black Legion's Chaos Space Marines.

name: aliens vs predator
description: Survive, hunt and prey in the deadly jungles and swamps in distinctly new and thrilling first person gameplay.

name: dmc devil may cry
description: In this retelling of Dante's origin story which is set against a contemporary backdrop, DmC Devil May Cry™ retains the stylish action.

name: torchlight
description: Adventure awaits you in Runic Games' first Award-winning Action RPG! Explore the random depths of this thriving town, collect loot and level up to save Torchlight and possibly the world as well.

name: total war shogun 2
description: Total War: SHOGUN 2 is the perfect mix of real-time and turn-based strategy gaming for newcomers and veterans alike.

name: medieval ii total war
description: Spanning the most turbulent era in Western history, your quest for territory and power takes you through Europe, Africa, the Middle East, and even onto the shores of the New World.

name: the witcher 3 wild hunt
description: As war rages in the Northern Realms, you sign the contract of your life: to pursue the Child of Prophecy, a living weapon that can transform the Earth.

name: total war attila
description: Against a darkening background of famine, disease and war, a new power is rising in the great steppes of the East. With a million horsemen at his back, the ultimate warrior king approaches, and his sights are set on Rome…

name: endless legend
description: Endless Legend is a 4X turn-based fantasy strategy game by the creators of Endless Space and Dungeon of the Endless. Control every aspect of your civilization as you struggle to save your homeworld Auriga. Create your own Legend!

name: dragon age origins  ultimate edition
description: Dragon Age: Origins - Ultimate Edition includes Dragon Age: Origins, Dragon Age: Origins - Awakening and all nine content packs.

name: sid meiers civilization iv beyond the sword
description: Sid Meier's Civilization IV®: Beyond the Sword is the second expansion pack for Civilization IV - the 2005 PC Game of the Year that has become a worldwide hit.

name: alien isolation
description: Discover the true meaning of fear in Alien: Isolation, a survival horror set in an atmosphere of constant dread and mortal danger.

name: homeworld remastered collection
description: Experience the epic space strategy games that redefined the RTS genre. Control your fleet and build an armada across more than 30 single-player missions. Choose unit types, fleet formations and flight tactics for each strategic situation.

name: crysis 2 maximum edition
description: Aliens are decimating New York City, only you have the technology to survive. Be The Weapon.

name: crysis
description: Classic first-person shooter from Crytek; The action-packed game design is back with its protected world, breathtaking and legendary battles you've been a fan of before. And with its graphics optimized for next-generation hardware products by rearranging!

name: medieval ii total war kingdoms
description: Medieval II: Total War Kingdoms is the official expansion to last year's award-winning Medieval II: Total War, presenting players with all-new territories to explore, troops to command, and enemies to conquer.

name: bioshock 2
description: Set approximately 10 years after the events of the original BioShock, the halls of Rapture once again echo with sins of the past. Along the Atlantic coastline, a monster has been snatching little girls and bringing them back to the undersea city of Rapture.

name: crusader kings ii
description: Explore one of the defining periods in world history in an experience crafted by the masters of Grand Strategy.

name: halflife source
description: Half-Life, which has received more than 50 Game of the Year awards, set new standards in action games when it was released in 1998. Half-Life: Source is the remake of this best-selling PC game with Source technology, with enhanced physical behavior and visual effects.

name: fear 3
description: FEAR 3 combines all the features that defined the original FEAR game: a terrifying paranormal experience, frantic combat, and a compelling story

name: supreme commander forged alliance
description: The last days of man are at hand.. Two years after the Infinite War the once great warring nations now lie in ruins, and humanity’s hope for a brighter future is nothing but a bitter memory.

name: halflife blue shift
description: Made by Gearbox Software and originally released as an add-on to Half-Life in 2001, Blue Shift chronicles a return to the Black Mesa Research Center, where you play as Barney Calhoun, the security guard's sidekick who helps Gordon through many difficult situations.

name: europa universalis iv
description: Four centuries of detailed history come alive in Paradox’s classic grand strategy game. Lead any nation from Renaissance to Revolution in a complex simulation of the early modern world. Master the art of war, diplomacy and trade to shape and change your nation’s history!

name: space engineers
description: Space Engineers is a sandbox game about engineering, construction, exploration and survival in space and on planets. Players build space ships, space stations, planetary outposts of various sizes and uses, pilot ships and travel through space to explore planets and gather resources to survive.

name: farming simulator 15
description: Welcome to the next generation of Farming Simulator! With its brand new graphics and physics engine, Farming Simulator 15 offers you a vast world full of details and visual effects that bring the farming simulator series to a new era.

name: sniper ghost warrior 2
description: Sniper: Ghost Warrior 2 takes the bulls-eye precision of its predecessor to new and exciting heights!

name: blockade 3d
description: BLOCKADE 3D! First Person Shooter in an editable procedural cubic world. A large arsenal of weapons, 4 teams at the same time and up to 32 players on one map. A large number of game modes!

name: sid meiers civilization beyond earth
description: Sid Meier’s Civilization: Beyond Earth is a new science-fiction-themed entry into the award winning Civilization series. As part of an expedition sent to find a home beyond Earth, lead your people into a new frontier, explore and colonize an alien planet and create a new civilization in space.

name: fable  the lost chapters
description: Each person you aid, each flower you crush, and each creature you slay will change this world forever. Fable: Who will you be?

name: dragon ball xenoverse
description: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE revisits famous battles from the series through your custom Avatar and other classic characters. New features include the mysterious Toki Toki City, new gameplay mechanics, new animations and many other amazing features!

name: call of duty ghosts
description: Outnumbered and outgunned, but not outmatched.Call of Duty®: Ghosts is an extraordinary step forward for one of the largest entertainment franchises of all-time.

name: call of duty black ops iii
description: Call of Duty®: Black Ops III Zombies Chronicles Edition includes the full base game and the Zombies Chronicles content expansion pack.

name: battleblock theater
description: Welcome to BattleBlock Theater! You’ve got no where to go but up...on stage. Play single player or co-op to free your friends and save Hatty Hattington! Jump, solve and battle your way through a mysterious theater inhabited by highly technological felines.

name: kerbal space program
description: In Kerbal Space Program, take charge of the space program for the alien race known as the Kerbals. You have access to an array of parts to assemble fully-functional spacecraft that flies (or doesn’t) based on realistic aerodynamic and orbital physics.

name: transistor
description: Explore the world of Transistor, the new sci-fi action role-playing game from the team that created Bastion.

name: dark souls ii
description: Developed by FROM SOFTWARE, DARK SOULS™ II is the highly anticipated sequel to the gruelling 2011 breakout hit Dark Souls. The unique old-school action RPG experience captivated imaginations of gamers worldwide with incredible challenge and intense emotional reward.

name: stronghold kingdoms
description: Live the life of a medieval lord online in Stronghold Kingdoms, the world's first Castle MMO. Farm calmly, be part of political mind games or besiege your nefarious enemies.

name: serious sam hd the second encounter
description: Serious Sam HD: The Second Encounter is a visually upgraded and fully Steam supported remake of the original high-adrenaline single-play and 16-player co-operative arcade-action FPS and Gamespot's Game of the Month!

name: spiral knights
description: Join the ranks of the Spiral Knights. Stranded on an alien world, you must explore the ever-changing Clockworks beneath its surface.

name: gotham city impostors free to play
description: Gotham City Impostors is now Free to Play! Join the Batman "helpers" or junior Jokerz in the streets of Gotham full of bullets, bodies, and bear traps.

name: rome total war
description: Control and conquer the greatest empire ever known to man.

name: grand theft auto iv
description: Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz and Luis Lopez. What the three of them have in common is that they live in America's worst city, Liberty City, where money and power are worshiped, a paradise for the wealthy and a hell for the poor.

name: homefront
description: The Rock Map Pack is Now Available! Join the Resistance, stand united and fight for freedom against an overwhelming military force.

name: halflife
description: Named Game of the Year by more than fifty media, Valve's debut and this adventure, created with award-winning technology, makes players think about how to survive in a realistic and terrifying World.

name: dragon age origins
description: When history tells the story of the Fifth Blight, what will be said about the hero who turned the tide against the darkspawn? Determine your legacy and fight for Thedas as a noble dwarf, an elf far from home, a mage apprentice, or a customized hero of your own design.

name: borderlands the presequel
description: Launch into the Borderlands universe and shoot ‘n’ loot your way through a brand new adventure that rockets you onto Pandora’s moon in Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel!

name: besiege
description: Besiege is a physics based building game in which you construct medieval siege engines. Battle your way through a 54 level singleplayer campaign, unleash chaos with your friends in multiplayer, create your own worlds with the level editor, customize your game with mods through the workshop.

name: dirty bomb
description: Work together or die alone! Fight to restore peace or raze London to the ground for money in this most challenging team-based shooter.

name: elite dangerous
description: Control your own spaceship in a brutal galaxy. Elite Dangerous is a multiplayer space epic.

name: trove
description: Grab your friends, hone your blades, and set off for adventure in Trove, the ultimate action MMO!

name: mitosis the game
description: Shoot your opponents or die trying! Attention: Extremely addictive Multiplayer game!

name: zombie panic source
description: Dive into the zombie apocalypse with Zombie Panic! Source: a cooperative, survival-horror first-person-shooter. A fast-paced standalone modification.

name: star conflict
description: Star Conflict is an action-packed, massively multiplayer space simulation game that puts players in the role of elite pilots engaging in a widespread interplanetary skirmish. The whole world for PVP and PVE!

name: mortal kombat x
description: Experience the Next Generation of the #1 Fighting Series. Mortal Kombat X combines brand new gameplay with its unique cinematic presentation.

name: the binding of isaac rebirth
description: When Isaac’s mother starts hearing the voice of God demanding a sacrifice be made to prove her faith, Isaac escapes into the basement facing droves of deranged enemies, lost brothers and sisters, his fears, and eventually his mother.

name: tom clancys splinter cell blacklist
description: The United States has a military presence in two-thirds of countries around the world, and some of them have had enough. A group of terrorists calling themselves The Engineers initiate a terror ultimatum called the Blacklist - a deadly countdown of escalating attacks on U.S. interests.

name: magicka
description: Magicka is a satirical action-adventure game set in a rich fantasy world based on Norse mythology. The player assumes the role of a wizard from a sacred order tasked with stopping an evil sorcerer who has thrown the world into turmoil, his foul creations besieging the forces of good.

name: warface
description: Warface is an exciting free-to-play MMO first-person shooter with millions of fans worldwide. It offers intense PvP modes, challenging PvE missions and raids with four different classes and a huge customizable ammo storage.

name: worms revolution
description: Worms™ Revolution is the latest game in the classic turn-based strategy series to come to the PC.

name: max payne 3
description: No longer a New York City cop, Max Payne moves to São Paulo to protect a wealthy family in an effort to finally escape his troubled past. This complete edition of Max Payne 3 includes the complete original game and all previously released downloadable content.

name: assassins creed iv black flag
description: The year is 1715. Pirates rule the Caribbean and have established their own lawless Republic where corruption, greediness and cruelty are commonplace.Among these outlaws is a brash young captain named Edward Kenway.

name: risk of rain
description: Risk of Rain is an action platformer with roguelike elements. With permanent death as a primary feature, players will have to play their best to get as far as possible. Fight on a mysterious planet with randomly spawning enemies and bosses, either alone or with 3 friends in online co-op.

name: call of duty advanced warfare
description: Call of Duty®: Advanced Warfare envisions a powerful future, where both technology and tactics have evolved to usher in a new era of combat for the franchise.Power Changes Everything.

name: grand theft auto san andreas
description: Five years ago Carl Johnson escaped from the pressures of life in Los Santos, San Andreas... a city tearing itself apart with gang trouble, drugs and corruption. Where filmstars and millionaires do their best to avoid the dealers and gangbangers. Now, it's the early 90s. Carl's got to go home.

name: how to survive
description: Your ship has sunk and you find yourself on a deserted island full of crazy creatures. How will you survive? Collect the pages of the survival guide and find a way around it! Find food, water and shelter before they perish! Ah, before I forget, is it getting dark or what? Find a way to get through the night!

name: dungeons of dredmor
description: Test your luck and cunning in this exciting RPG as you craft, cast, and pillage your way through Lord Dredmor's Dungeons.

name: orcs must die
description: Slice, fry, skewer and toss – however you do, orcs must die in this fantasy action strategy game from Robot Entertainment.

name: skullgirls
description: The ultimate Skullgirls experience! Featuring 14 hand-animated characters, fully voiced story mode, countless palettes, and unparalleled GGPO-based multiplayer netcode.

name: natural selection 2
description: A fast paced multiplayer shooter that pits aliens against humans in a strategic and action-packed struggle for survival!

name: postal 2
description: Live a week in the life of "The Postal Dude"; a hapless everyman just trying to check off some chores. Buying milk, returning an overdue library book, getting Gary Coleman's autograph, what could possibly go wrong?

name: guns of icarus online
description: Assemble your crew, take to the skies in the premier PvP airship combat game. Guns of Icarus Online is all about flying massive airships, shooting big turret weapons, and working as a team for supremacy of the skies. Everyone as one, victory or death, together.

name: resident evil 6  biohazard 6
description: Blending action and survival horror, Resident Evil 6 promises to be the dramatic horror experience of 2013.

name: broforce
description: When evil threatens the world, the world calls on Broforce - an under-funded, over-powered paramilitary organization dealing exclusively in excessive force.

name: injustice gods among us ultimate edition
description: Injustice: Gods Among Us Ultimate Edition enhances the bold new franchise to the fighting game genre from NetherRealm Studios. Featuring six new playable characters, over 30 new skins, and 60 new S.T.A.R. Labs missions, this edition packs a punch.

name: trials evolution gold edition
description: Trials Evolution: Gold Edition marks the Trials franchise’s triumphant return to the PC gaming platform. RedLynx’s signature franchise, the Trials series first made its mark in gaming with the 2008 release of Trials 2 SE for the PC.

name: supreme commander 2
description: Includes 47 Steam achievements, leaderboards, and stats!

name: the darkness ii
description: An intense first person shooter that delivers a twisted and gripping narrative of tragedy, modern crime drama, and supernatural horror.

name: call of duty black ops ii
description: Pushing the boundaries of what fans have come to expect from the record-setting entertainment franchise, Call of Duty®: Black Ops II propels players into a near future Cold War

name: legend of grimrock
description: Use the Dungeon Editor to build entirely new adventures and challenges for other players to solve.

name: age of mythology extended edition
description: Age of Mythology is back! Choose your god and take to the battlefield in this classic, upgraded with full Steamworks integration and enhanced features.

name: hammerwatch
description: A hack and slash action adventure, set in a fantasy pixel art environment. Play solo or co-op in this adventure from bottom to top of Castle Hammerwatch. Kill hordes of enemies with varied looks and features through four unique environments with traps, hidden secrets and puzzles.

name: call of duty world at war
description: Call of Duty is back, redefining war like you've never experienced before. Building on the Call of Duty 4®: Modern Warfare engine, Call of Duty: World at War immerses players into the most gritty and chaotic WWII combat ever experienced.

name: dungeon defenders ii
description: Dungeon Defenders II is a cooperative Action Tower Defense game packed with roleplaying elements like loot, leveling, and pets.

name: red faction armageddon
description: Red Faction: Armageddon Path to War includes 4 new missions, 2 new items and 10 new achievements!

name: hero siege
description: Hero Siege is a Hack N Slash Roguelike RPG with randomly generated zones, loot, randomized enemies, bosses and more! 4 Player Online Multiplayer!

name: call of duty 4 modern warfare
description: The new action-thriller from the award-winning team at Infinity Ward, the creators of the Call of Duty® series, delivers the most intense and cinematic action experience ever.

name: assassins creed
description: Assassin's Creed™ is the next-gen game developed by Ubisoft Montreal that redefines the action genre. While other games claim to be next-gen with impressive graphics and physics, Assassin's Creed merges technology, game design, theme and emotions into a world where you instigate chaos and become a vulnerable, yet powerful, agent of change.

name: grid autosport
description: GRID is a racing experience like no other. It offers a unique side-by-side racing experience that appeals to everyone, where each race is unpredictable, with the rivals and arch-rivals you create on your way to conquer the world of motorsports. Get this adrenaline-filled game now.

name: brawlhalla
description: An epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online or local. Try casual free-for-alls, ranked matches, or invite friends to a private room. And it's free! Play cross-platform with millions of players on PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, iOS, Android & Steam! Frequent updates. Over fifty Legends.

name: baldurs gate enhanced edition
description: Powered by a revamped and enhanced version of the Infinity Engine, Baldur's Pass: Remastered Edition ™ includes the entire Baldur's Pass adventure, the Tales of the Sword Coast expansion, a new adventure you will see for the first time in the remastered version, and three new characters: the Monk Rasaad yn Bashir of Calimshan, Wild Mage Neera and Evil Blackguard Dorn Il-Khan.

name: star trek online
description: In Star Trek Online, the Star Trek universe appears for the first time on a truly massive scale. Players take the captain's chair as they command their own starship and crew. Explore strange new worlds, seek out new life and new civilizations, and boldly go where no one has gone before.

name: fistful of frags
description: Multiplayer based, first person enabled, action packed and skill demanding shooter set in the Wild West times. A unique combination of non stop action and slow but powerful weaponry.

name: gunz 2 the second duel
description: GunZ 2: the Second Duel is a free-to-play 3D TPS and is the most fast-paced tough action shooter game.

name: speedrunners
description: Cut-throat multiplayer running game that pits 4 players against each other, locally and/or online. Run, jump, swing around, and use devious weapons and pick-ups to knock opponents off-screen! One of the most competitive games you'll ever play.

name: thief
description: Garrett, the Master Thief, steps out of the shadows into the City. In this treacherous place, where the Baron’s Watch spreads a rising tide of fear and oppression, his skills are the only things he can trust. Even the most cautious citizens and their best-guarded possessions are not safe from his reach.

name: reign of kings
description: Struggle to survive in a harsh medieval world. Hunt wildlife, mine resources, build structures, and craft weapons and armor in order to protect yourself. You may form a guild, bring war to all opposition, and try to seize the throne and become king!

name: sanctum 2
description: Sanctum 2 is the sequel to the world’s first Tower Defense/FPS hybrid game. Pick from four unique character classes and embark on a mission to protect the oxygen-producing Cores from hordes of deadly aliens who are threatened by their existence.

name: evolve
description: Play Evolve for free with Evolve Stage 2! Evolve Stage 2 is the next generation free-to-play multiplayer shooter with addictive 4v1 gameplay. A player-controlled monster must outsmart and escape four uniquely skilled hunters.

name: divinity original sin
description: Gather your party and get ready for the kick-ass new version of GameSpot's PC Game of the Year 2014. With hours of new content, new game modes, full voiceovers, split-screen multiplayer, and thousands of improvements, there's never been a better time to explore the epic world of Rivellon!

name: valkyria chronicles
description: The critically acclaimed Valkyria Chronicles is now available on PC in 1080p True HD, including all previously released DLC!

name: project zomboid
description: Project Zomboid is the ultimate in zombie survival. Alone or in MP: you loot, build, craft, fight, farm and fish in a struggle to survive. A hardcore RPG skillset, a vast map, massively customisable sandbox and a cute tutorial raccoon await the unwary.

name: pillars of eternity
description: Prepare to be enchanted by a world where the choices you make and the paths you choose shape your destiny. Obsidian Entertainment, the developer of Fallout: New Vegas™ and South Park: The Stick of Truth™, together with Paradox Interactive is proud to present Pillars of Eternity.

name: magic duels
description: MORE CARDS. MORE STRATEGY. BIGGER STORY. Collect 1,300+ winnable cards, battle in 60+ single-player missions and win victories in epic online duels.

name: sakura clicker
description: The latest entry in the Sakura series is more action-packed than ever before! Sakura Clickers is a fast-paced, exciting adventure, full of content, in which you defeat your foes with the power of your mouse!

name: shadowrun returns
description: The unique cyberpunk-meets-fantasy world of Shadowrun has gained a huge cult following since its creation nearly 25 years ago. Now, creator Jordan Weisman returns to the world of Shadowrun, modernizing this classic game setting as a single player, turn-based tactical RPG.

name: age of wonders iii
description: Age of Wonders III is the long anticipated sequel to the award-winning strategy series. Delivering a unique mix of Empire Building, Role Playing and Warfare, Age of Wonders III offers the ultimate in turn-based fantasy strategy for veterans of the series and new players alike!

name: grand theft auto vice city
description: Welcome to Vice City. Welcome to the 1980s. From the decade of big hair, excess and pastel suits comes a story of one man's rise to the top of the criminal pile.

name: far cry 2
description: You are a gun for hire, trapped in a war-torn African state, stricken with malaria and forced to make deals with corrupt warlords on both sides of the conflict in order to make this country your home.

name: toribash
description: Toribash is an innovative free-to-play online turn-based fighting game where you’re able to design your own moves. Complete control over character's body, hundreds of game mods and bloody mess with full body dismemberment - you've never been able to annihilate your enemies like that before!

name: darkest dungeon
description: Darkest Dungeon is a challenging gothic roguelike turn-based RPG about the psychological stresses of adventuring. Recruit, train, and lead a team of flawed heroes against unimaginable horrors, stress, disease, and the ever-encroaching dark. Can you keep your heroes together when all hope is lost?

name: cry of fear
description: Cry of Fear is a psychological single-player and co-op horror game set in a deserted town filled with horrific creatures and nightmarish delusions. You play as a young man desperately searching for answers in the cold Scandinavian night, finding his way through the city as he slowly descends into madness.

name: just cause 2 multiplayer mod
description: JC2-MP is a project to bring multiplayer to Just Cause 2 in all of its magnificent glory. Imagine the chaos of normal Just Cause 2, then extending it out to dozens, hundreds, and even thousands of players.

name: shadow warrior
description: Shadow Warrior is a bold reimagining of the classic 3D Realms’ shooter from independent developer Flying Wild Hog (Hard Reset) starring the legendary and quick-witted warrior Lo Wang.

name: assassins creed revelations
description: Ezio Auditore walks in the footsteps of the legendary mentor Altair, on a dangerous journey of discovery and revelation.

name: brink
description: You decide the combat role you want to assume in the world of Brink as you fight to save yourself and mankind’s last refuge!

name: the long dark
description: Long Dark is a thought-provoking and exploration-driven survival challenge in the aftermath of a geomagnetic disaster where players must fend for themselves as they explore a vast icy nature.

name: serious sam 3 bfe
description: Serious Sam 3: BFE is a prequel to the original indie fast action FPS and Game of the Year sensation - Serious Sam: The First Encounter!

name: grid 2
description: Be fast, be first and be famous as the race returns in GRID 2, the sequel to the BAFTA-award winning, multi-million selling Race Driver: GRID.

name: life is strange
description: Episode 1 now FREE! Life is Strange is an award-winning and critically acclaimed episodic adventure game that allows the player to rewind time and affect the past, present and future.

name: fallout 3
